parameters.name: HostAccountIds
parameters.description:
The host account IDs.

>  You must specify this parameter. You can call the [ListHostAccounts](~~462937~~) operation to query the host account IDs.

parameters.name: HostShareKeyId
parameters.description:
The shared key ID.

>  You must specify this parameter. You can call the [ListHostShareKeys](~~462973~~) operation to query the shared key ID.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the bastion host. You can call the [DescribeInstances](~~153281~~) operation to query the ID of the bastion host.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the bastion host. For more information about the mapping between region IDs and region names, see [Regions and zones](~~40654~~).
